name: Rover's Day Out
description:
Rover's Day Out placed first in IFComp in 2009 -- much to the surprise of both myself and co-author Ben Collins-Sussman. It was my first public effort in Inform 7 and also our first time collaborating on an interactive fiction project. 

We were like kids in a candy story getting our feet wet in Inform 7 and also trying to take advantage of all the capabilities that the Glulx virtual machine offered.
